attributes.action: Make Lee Jasper give his subsidised council home to a key worker
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lee Jasper (former advisor to Ken Livingstone) has been living in a subsidised 4 bed council home in London, paying only £90/week rent while earning £120,000 per year working for City Hall.  He should be forced to move and his home given to key workers.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
